New Records: India won their second ICC Men's T20 World Cup trophy
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored 76, his highest in a T20 World Cup final
Hein Klaasen scored 52 for South Africa
The match was won by India in the final over
Pre-Game Insights: President of India congratulated the team
Ian Raphael Bishop predicted South Africa's future success
Rohit Sharma was praised for his leadership
Post-Match Reflections: Players and coaches expressed pride and relief
The victory was described as a pivotal moment
Miscellaneous Highlights: The tournament lasted almost four weeks
It was India's first win in a T20 World Cup final
The celebration and emotions of the players were highlighted
